experiences: During my internship at a startup specializing in a learning platform for students, I focused on frontend development. I worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, using Angular to create user-friendly and responsive interfaces while collaborating with the team to deliver a seamless user experience.
At DCI, I learned both frontend and backend development. I worked with HTML, CSS, SASS, and JavaScript for the frontend, and Node.js for the backend.
